Bernie Sanders ( technically an Independent, though he generally sides with Democrats) said Paul Ryan 's Roadmap would slash Social Security benefits and provide tax breaks for the wealthy, while raising taxes on just about everyone else. The fact of the matter is, Social Security has not contributed one nickel to our deficit or our national debt, and it must be protected, Bernie Sanders added.
